newsitem.title: SRI LANKA: Sri Lanka appoints new envoys to China, U.S..
newsitem.headline: Sri Lanka appoints new envoys to China, U.S..

text.p: Sri Lanka has appointed new ambassadors to United State of America and China, the foreign ministry said in a statement on Friday.
It said former foreign secretary Rodney Vandergert will be the new envoy to Beijing and Warnaseria Rasaputram will take over as the new ambassador in Washington.
Vandergert, a former envoy to the former Soviet Union and later Canada, retired as foreign secretary earlier this month.
Rasaputram, a former central bank governor and envoy to France and the United Nations, is currently the Sri Lankan high commissioner in Malaysia, the statement said.
